game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Game and levels are created and menu windows are implemented.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game()
        Initialise a login page upon startup. Sets the visability of the window to true upon startup.

    • Method Detail

      • openSplashScreen

        public void openSplashScreen()
        Initialises a splash screen once the user has logged in. Opens a new window once prompted.

      • openInstructions

        public void openInstructions()
        Holds the instructions interface and creates a new window to display. Initialises a new panel to make the instructions panel.

      • beginGame

        public void beginGame()
        Game shall be ran from beginGame(). A new world is created in a MoneyView to display live scores.

      • getPlayer

        public Robber getPlayer()
        The player in the current level.
        Returns:
        The player used in the world

        Is the current level of the game finished?
        Returns:
        Return a boolean if the world has been completed

      • goNextLevel

        public void goNextLevel()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Advance to the next level of the game once level is complete. Refreshes the time for each level
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If no file is found.
